file_content.text: [The impact of landing has jammed the escape pod's hatch.]
Ack! Ack!
Everything's alright, Nadia. Breathe easy.
You're safe.
Oh, it's so good to feel the breeze again!
Are you okay?
I knew I'd see you again. I knew we'd both be alright.
I got a bit singed running for the pod, but I'm okay.
Will be stronger for this, small thing.
Dearest Nadia, we were quite heartbroken without you.
We would have got here sooner, but the Imperials were making some noise.
Welcome back.
It was worth it. I got all the data I could find from the Javelin's computers. Mission reports, plans, details--it's all here!
There are Republic generals who desperately need this information.
We should pass it along.
Wait. There's something we need to do first.
If I'd lost you, none of it would matter.
It's nothing compared to you.
It's okay. We're together again. We can talk later.
I'll make sure the Jedi Council hears of this.
Excellent work, Padawan.
Someone had to do it, and I was there.
A Jedi stays calm and rational at all times. And we don't know if there's anything useful.
Don't get overexcited.
I'm sorry, Master. But, if I may speak?
Pull yourself together, Padawan. Did you complete your mission?
Where's the data?
I... am sorry, Master. I have your data safe. Can I please ask something?
Before we pass them on, I need Holiday to fix one of these files. It's badly corrupted but some of the audio still works.
But honey, we're right out in the open. And I'd need a holotransmitter.
Is there somewhere safe we can fix this? I... I think it has information about the First Son.
The Corellian resistance has a shelter. If this concerns the First Son, we should go immediately.
Then follow me.
A friend of ours with the Corellian resistance is nearby.
Drizan's shelter is safe.
We could go to Captain Drizan's shelter, but this area's full of Imperial forces.
I hope you're ready to fight.
I'm still a bit shaky.
Uhhh. I'm sorry. I don't know how far I can walk.
Fortunately, we made some new friends while you were away.
You call, we come to repay debts. As Quil ordered. This is friend? Seems very small.
Huh. Easier to smuggle through tunnels, to Drizan's shelter.
Nadia is injured. Go as carefully as you can.
Take good care of her.
Two Jedi might be better than one, if you run into trouble.
Should I go with you?
Too many takes too long. Risks Empire's attention. We'll get friend back, very quick.
The sooner you stop talking and leave, the safer she'll be.
Just make it fast.
I get to see the Selonian tunnels? This might even be fun. I'll meet you at this shelter.
Ack! Ack!
Give yourself a moment to recover.
Slowly. Deep breaths.
Just give me five minutes under this beautiful sky.
Are you alright?
You're alive. I should have guessed you'd be okay.
I hit some chop on the way down, but I'll survive.
Is good to free you. Better to die on battlefield than in steel box.
I trust you held on to our data during your absence, Lieutenant?
Hello again.
Sorry about the wait. We came as fast as we could.
Here. One Imperial dreadnaught's complete tactical database, safe and sound.
We should share this with Republic Command and the Jedi Council at once.
This must go to the Republic.
Uh, not right away.
I would hate to have risked losing you for nothing.
I'm glad you're safe, too.
I told you we'd make it. I wish--sorry, we'll have to talk later.
I think this may warrant a medal.
You deserve a reward.
If you're offering, I won't say no. Just one thing, first.
Let's see what's in those files before we get overexcited.
It's too early to celebrate.
Is the tactical data safe?
Report, Lieutenant.
Mission complete. I got the Javelin's entire tactical database. Hardly bled on the datapad at all.
One of these files is corrupted. Deliberately, maybe. I need Holiday to fix it, before we pass it on.
Here? It's not very safe. Besides, I need a holotransmitter.
Is there somewhere secure we can go to fix the file? Its audio is broken up, but I heard... It might have intel about the First Son.
There's a resistance shelter nearby; if this is about the First Son I need to see this file immediately.
Then we must act quickly.
A friend of ours, Captain Drizan, has a safe position.
Drizan's shelter would do.
We can commandeer a small resistance shelter, though there's Imperial forces in between.
I know a place. Can you fight?
That... uhhh. That may be a problem.
I'm... not sure I can keep up. I got bounced around pretty hard.
Perhaps this would be a good time for you to meet our new friends.
You call, we answer, as Quil orders. To repay our debt.
This is friend? Bit messy. We will take to Drizan's shelter. Smuggle through tunnels, very quick.
Don't rush if it'll make his injuries worse.
Go carefully, he's hurt.
Do you need me to come along? I could watch your backs.
Maybe I should go with you.
Is safer for us with fewer. And faster. Friend will be fine, you'll see.
We have urgent business at Drizan's shelter, so no dawdling.
Be sure it's quick.
More dark enclosed spaces? If there's a kolto pack at the end, I'm game. See you at this shelter.
